trans-unit.source: What happens when you provision a computer (WDK 8.1)
trans-unit.target: What happens when you provision a computer (WDK 8.1)

trans-unit.source: Using Microsoft Visual Studio to configure and set up driver deployment and driver testing is called *provisioning a target computer* or *provisioning a test computer*.
trans-unit.target: Using Microsoft Visual Studio to configure and set up driver deployment and driver testing is called *provisioning a target computer* or *provisioning a test computer*.

trans-unit.source: For information about provisioning, see [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909).
trans-unit.target: For information about provisioning, see [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909).

trans-unit.source: Here we show what happens when you use version 8.1 of the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) to provision a target computer.
trans-unit.target: Here we show what happens when you use version 8.1 of the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) to provision a target computer.

trans-unit.source: Provisioning a computer performs the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: Provisioning a computer performs the following tasks:

trans-unit.source: Creates a user named WDKRemoteUser and switches to that user
trans-unit.target: Creates a user named WDKRemoteUser and switches to that user

trans-unit.source: Installs .NET 4.0 if it is not already installed
trans-unit.target: Installs .NET 4.0 if it is not already installed

trans-unit.source: Installs [Test Authoring and Execution Framework (TAEF)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh439725) (WDK Client)
trans-unit.target: Installs [Test Authoring and Execution Framework (TAEF)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh439725) (WDK Client)

trans-unit.source: Sets the power policy to a high power configuration, which prevents the system from entering Standby or Hibernate Mode when idle
trans-unit.target: Sets the power policy to a high power configuration, which prevents the system from entering Standby or Hibernate Mode when idle

trans-unit.source: Reboots the target computer if necessary
trans-unit.target: Reboots the target computer if necessary

trans-unit.source: Removing provisioning from the target computer
trans-unit.target: Removing provisioning from the target computer

trans-unit.source: Once you have provisioned a target computer, you cannot completely remove the provisioning.
trans-unit.target: Once you have provisioned a target computer, you cannot completely remove the provisioning.

trans-unit.source: However, you can remove most of the provisioning from the target computer by using Visual Studio on the host computer.
trans-unit.target: However, you can remove most of the provisioning from the target computer by using Visual Studio on the host computer.

trans-unit.source: On the host computer, in Visual Studio, on the **Driver** menu, choose **Test > Configure Computers**.
trans-unit.target: On the host computer, in Visual Studio, on the **Driver** menu, choose **Test > Configure Computers**.

trans-unit.source: Select the name of the target computer, and click **Delete computer**.
trans-unit.target: Select the name of the target computer, and click **Delete computer**.

trans-unit.source: When the removal process is complete, click **Finish**.
trans-unit.target: When the removal process is complete, click **Finish**.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall WDK Test Target Setup from the target computer.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall WDK Test Target Setup from the target computer.

trans-unit.source: When you remove provisioning from the target computer, these items are removed:
trans-unit.target: When you remove provisioning from the target computer, these items are removed:

trans-unit.source: Removing provisioning does not change these items:
trans-unit.target: Removing provisioning does not change these items:
